snippet.title: Feudums • "Once Again"
snippet.description:
Feudums is an upcoming indie 4X / Grand Strategy game with player-to-player vassalage, full modding support and community-driven narrative • a unique crossbred of Crusader Kings and MMO-style massively multiplayer setup (minus the pay-to-win elements), hand-drawn visuals & the vibe of '90s cult strategy games like the Lords of the Realm or Genesia.

This video is a short teaser about the game and its current stage for the #PitchYaGame event on Twitter.

Subscribe to our channel to never miss our news, work-in-progress developer videos or tutorials!

Follow & Wishlist Feudums on Steam to show us you're interested and to stay in the loop: 
• https://store.steampowered.com/app/473750/Feudums/

Get the latest in-development demo (and take it as our transparent and interactive development diary):
• Links to downloads: https://feudums.com/download
• You can now also grab it directly from our Steam page!

Join the community, talk to the devs, follow them to learn more:

• Discord: https://discord.gg/QgERDnU
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/feudums
• GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/@Feudums
• itch.io: https://kalamonastudios.itch.io/feudums
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/feudumsmmo/
• Feudums website: https://www.feudums.com/

Support us so we can do more in less time:
• Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/feudums


#indiegame #medieval #strategygame #simulationgames #mmo #multiplayer #indiedev #indiegames #indiegamedev #gamerplay #teaser #music #trailer #grandstrategy #gamedev #uiuix #4xgame #patreon #tacticon2023
